creator: rab@hackhofer.com
text:
I'am using the HTTP URL Re-writing Modifier with my Testplan.
If I start the Testplan the first time, the run stop's instantly.
I have found following entries in the log-File

07/17/2003 10:23:04 AM ERROR - jmeter.engine:  java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.apache.jmeter.protocol.http.modifier.URLRewritingModifier.process(URLRewritingModifier.java:45)
	at org.apache.jmeter.threads.TestCompiler.runPreProcessors(TestCompiler.java:132)
	at org.apache.jmeter.threads.TestCompiler.configureSampler(TestCompiler.java:119)
	at org.apache.jmeter.threads.JMeterThread.run(JMeterThread.java:261)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:536)

This message appears for each Http-Request.

If I deactivate the Re-writing Modifier and start the Test Plan - < it works.
But not for me because i need the Modifier.
If i now activate the Modifiert again, ana launch the Test Plan everything works
fine.
If I restart Jmeter the same thing happens again.
This Bug appears with different Testplans.
The Bug didn't appear in Version 1.8

The is solved in 1.9 RC3.
My Testplans now work correct.
creator: rab@hackhofer.com
